title: Update application name to TestAut in header

requirements.summary: Update the application name displayed in the header navigation to 'TestAut'
acceptanceCriteria: The header displays 'TestAut' as the application name
The change is visible on all pages that use the Layout component
The link and text styling remain consistent with the existing design

file_operations.description: Update the header brand name/logo text from the current application name to 'TestAut'. Modify the link element and its child span element that displays the application name in the header navigation. Preserve all existing styling, classes, and layout structure.
